channel.title: CVE Feed for AVEVA -- InTouch
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AVEVA -- InTouch

item.title: CVE-2021-32942|2024-09-17T03:17:35.496Z -- aveva -- intouch
item.description: The vulnerability could expose cleartext credentials from AVEVA InTouch Runtime 2020 R2 and all prior versions (WindowViewer) if an authorized, privileged user creates a diagnostic memory dump of the process and saves it to a non-protected location.
